item.title: Midnight Commander
item.description: Overview Midnight Commander is based on versatile text interfaces, such as Ncurses or S-Lang, which allows it to work on a regular console, inside an X Window terminal, over SSH connections and all kinds of remote shells. Shorcuts Ctrl + x, q quick preview (x = comman, q = quick view) Shift + F6 rename file Ctrl + o open/close terminal Ctrl + s cd in active panel Esc + c quick cd Esc + i open same directory in another panel Ctrl + r refresh Configure open as View/Open Menu: Command > Edit extension file
